body.p:
The only invalid chair that I can
get any tidings of is to be had in Hartford
Connecticut. To my astonishment I have found
none made here. So in making inquiry
today of a gentleman with whom I am
well acquainted and who had a knowledge of
the manufacturer of the desired chair, I decided
that he might order one as he kindly
offered to do so. So by Tuesday next if
it should not be exactly ready for delivery
it will be well on the way. Just what it will
cost I cannot tell as the gentleman could not
tell me but I rather think it will not be
more than twenty five dollars if that
much. Did I do right in ordering one? I
think it will be satisfactory.

I have been hoping for some weeks
past to be able to find time to come fulfill
my engagement with your father in
making a fishing excursion to the
old country (the pines) but as yet the way
looks rather dark. On Monday I have
to serve on the jury and when the term of
the court will end I cannot tell, usually
it last 2 weeks, some times longer. As soon as I shall get
free from that
bondage I shall
fix the time
